description:

1. Share your NGL Link
2. Friends answer right on your story
3. Get responses on NGL

To ensure the safety of our users, NGL leverages Hive Moderation’s automated moderation solution as the first line of defense to scan messages for inappropriate content. 

-

- Hints about who sent each of their messages

NGL Pro is a paid renewable subscription.

Pinterest is a place of endless possibilities. You can:
- Discover everyday inspiration
- Shop styles you love
- Try and learn something new

Create boards, save Pins and make collages of all your inspiration. Unlock billions of ideas, from fashion tips and easy recipes to DIY projects and fresh ways to redo your space. Creating the life you love? 

It's Possible.

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Privacy: https://www.gotinder.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.gotinder.com/terms
Visit: https://www.tinderlove.com/

Experience the world of Airtel. Perplexity Pro AI worth ₹17000 is free for all Airtel users. Claim it on Thanks App along with easy recharges, hassle-free bill payments, call manager, data balance check and instant UPI transactions. Get amazing cashback and discount coupons on Airtel Payments Bank and Airtel Wallet transactions. Download the app to explore the new design and its many unique features.

Airtel 5G Plus
Airtel becomes the first operator to launch 5G in India. Airtel 5G Plus delivers up to 30x faster speed than 4G which allows the users to download heavy files in just a few seconds. You can now experience 4K video viewing without any buffer on your devices. All this can be done, without changing your existing SIM. Experience the 5G Plus journey seamlessly on Airtel Thanks App.

Mobile Prepaid Recharge
Access plan details, data usage, expiry date through a single card available in real-time on the app. Never miss a due date, get prepaid recharge reminders on the App homepage.
Easily add multiple Airtel accounts and recharge online for all of them on Airtel Thanks App

Postpaid
Enjoy a hassle-free experience, where you can browse, choose your suitable plan and make bill payments within minutes.
Access data usage, bill date through a single card available in real-time on the app.

DTH
Recharge your DTH connection on the Airtel Thanks app to get exclusive offers and cashback with every DTH online recharge. Track your connection validity, add/remove Channels, get quick help on the app.

Broadband
Get the best broadband deals with an option to upgrade your existing plan and make your monthly broadband bills payment with ease. Enjoy office-like internet with a new connection of Airtel Xstream Fiber ranging from ₹499 to ₹3,999.

UPI Money Transfer
Enjoy lightning-fast safe and secure UPI money transfer on the Airtel Thanks app. Scan any QR code and make contactless online payment to any merchant.

Call Manager
Call Manager is a functionality in Thanks app for all Airtel mobile users. With this feature, we will enable users for the first time to track all the calls and alerts in a single place – calls which went through and those which got missed due to network not being available at caller’s end. User will be notified about all the calls they missed while they were out of network or the person they were calling was out of network, exclusively on the Airtel Thanks app.

Pay Utility Bills
Electricity, water, gas, Postpaid, piped gas, and others- the Airtel Thanks app is the only app you'll need to pay all your utility bills within minutes.

Airtel Payments Bank
Open a Safe Second Account with Airtel Payments Bank anytime, anywhere in minutes.
- Scan & Pay on any QR, transfer money, pay utility bills or make instant mobile & DTH recharges
- Safe Banking with Fraud Alarm, Manage Limits & Sleep mode
- Set up Autopay for OTT, loan EMIs, insurance premiums, Load Cash & Auto Load money
- Buy or Recharge NETC FASTag

Unique Features
- ‎Store up to 2GB data on Airtel Cloud for free and never delete anything you love.
- ‎Manage multiple Airtel accounts in one place
- ‎Get free OTT subscriptions such as Hotstar, Netflix, Amazon Prime with Prepaid, Postpaid, DTH, and Fiber plans
- ‎Explore latest news in the Discover section
 
Wait no more, enter a world of convenience and benefits with the Airtel Thanks app. Download NOW!

Vidbite: Fresh Life, wisdom in the preservation
VidBite food preservation software, with professional features and intimate design, guarding fresh food, let fresh more intelligent.
Freshness screening: scientific classification of three grades ("Fresh", "Use as soon as possible", "Expired") accurately control the status of food ingredients to avoid waste.
Food Card: high-definition photography, detailed record of food ingredients information, each time taken to quickly recall the initial state of food to ensure the best state of consumption.
Food classification: according to the type of efficient screening, combined with freshness, rapid positioning of the required ingredients.
Download VidBite to make every bite of food fresh and delicious, and make eating healthier and easier.

The dating app bringing people closer to love

Bumble is the dating app where people meet, make connections, and start their love stories. We believe meaningful relationships are the foundation of a happy, healthy life — and we're here to help you find yours with a commitment to member safety and tools that empower confident dating.

Match with the right people, date, and find meaningful connection

Bumble is a free app for meeting singles and building connections grounded in mutual respect and trust. Whether you’re ready to find the one or date for fun, Bumble can help you connect with real people to build something authentic.

As champions of love, we prioritize creating a space where our members feel respected, confident, and empowered to make connections

- Our members are at the heart of everything we do
- We put safety first — so you can date with confidence, knowing you’re connecting with verified matches
- Respect, courage, and joy guide how we show up — and inspire others to do the same

Try our free features — built to make dating easier
- For better connections, conversations, and dates, personalize your profile with interests and prompts to showcase who you are, what you’re into, and what you’re looking for
- Trust that the person you’re talking to is real with ID Verification
- Feel confident with expert-backed dating advice designed to help you succeed
- See what music you bond over by linking your Spotify account
- Video chat and share your favorite pictures with your matches to get to know them better
- Chat with peace of mind — knowing that when you’re talking to new people, all messages must meet our community guidelines
- Get extra reassurance by sharing the details of your meetups with someone you trust
- If you’re ever in need of a dating break, hide your profile with the Snooze Mode (you'll still keep all your matches)

Want even more ways to connect? Bumble Premium unlocks extra features to boost your dating experience
- See everyone who likes you
- Use Advanced Filters like “What are they looking for?” to meet people who share your values, hobbies, and goals
- Rematch with expired connections — so you don’t miss out on a great potential date
- Browse anonymously with Incognito Mode and only seen by who you want to see you
- Extend your matches by 24 hours
- Swipe as much as you like to meet more people
- Tap into dating scenes around the world with Travel Mode
- Stand out and get noticed with free SuperSwipes & Spotlights, refreshed weekly

Inclusivity is key
At Bumble, we promise to support and include all forms of love: straight, gay, lesbian, queer, and beyond. We want everyone in our community to feel safe and welcome. So no matter how you identify, if you're looking for a place to chat, date, and find real love, we’ve got what you’re looking for.

---
Bumble is a free dating app to download and use. We offer optional subscription packages (Bumble Boost & Bumble Premium) and non-subscription, single, and multi-use paid features (Bumble Spotlight & Bumble SuperSwipe). Your personal data is securely processed in line with our privacy policy and applicable laws—be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions.
https://bumble.com/en/privacy
https://bumble.com/en/terms
Bumble Inc. is the parent company of Bumble, Badoo, and BumbleBFF, social networks, and dating apps free to download and use.

Welcome to AfroIntroductions! The favourite African dating app for over 4.5 million singles worldwide.

We are one of the most trusted and used African dating apps connecting women and men worldwide. Whether you're looking for a great date, more friends, or that perfect partner, AfroIntroductions is your starting point.

With the AfroIntroductions app, you can create a new account and begin writing your love story in a matter of minutes. Join now and start to chat African women or Ugandan men near you or anywhere in the world. African dating just got so much easier!

How it works:
- Download the AfroIntroductions dating app.
- Create and edit your dating profile on the go.
- Update your profile with your interests and latest photos to attract more attention from Tanzanian women, South African singles, Ugandan men, and many more daters.
- Use our extensive dating app search functionality to find the ideal singles. Try searching for African women, South African singles, people in Mozambique dating online & so many other filters!
- PRO TIP: Send a Like before you start chatting.
- Start a Chat with other singles online and get to know each other.
- Receive instant notifications when a single likes you back or replies to your message!
- Upgrade your African dating membership on AfroIntroductions for bonus features that make your profile stand out to potential partners.

Download now to find your love match! Everyone deserves to chat and meet easily in their search for love. That’s why we’re so passionate about connecting single women and men, from all over the world.

- REAL people. We have advanced algorithms to check for fraudulent profiles.
- Profile UPGRADES for serious daters looking for their perfect partner.
- EASILY search, like and chat African singles locally - including Tanzanian women, South African singles and Ugandan men - and singles all over the world.
- 24/7 Customer Service: Your dating experience is important to us. Our team of multi-linguistic customer service specialists are here to help you in the search for love.

Meet singles and find a great connection - download AfroIntroductions today!

Magic cleaner is a smart cleaning application that helps you easily find and analyze similar images, blurred images and other junk images, so you can easily free up space on your phone.

In addition to cleaning albums, Magic cleaner also provides you with a contact organizer that helps you find invalid contacts and optimize your address book with just one click.

Magic cleaner is not only good at cleaning and optimizing, but also provides the function of blocking spam messages, you can choose the phone number to be blocked according to your needs, and the app will block all the spam messages for you, so you won't be disturbed.

All Magic cleaner features and services


Album organizer.
-Find and organize screenshots
-Find and organize similar pictures
-Find and organize blurred images
-Find and organize oversized images
-Find and organize similar videos
-Find and organize oversized videos

Address Book Organizer.
-Find and organize duplicate number contacts
-Find and sort duplicate name contacts
-Find and sort duplicate email contacts
-Find and sort contacts with no name
-Find and sort contacts with no number

Other functions.
-Image GPS information removal-Spam blocking
-Image compression
-Cloud photo album


Join us now, you will save a lot of time on album organizing, address book organizing, and the app will help you free up space on your phone as fast as possible.

GET TO KNOW EACH OTHER

GROW TOGETHER

Couple Joy has everything you need to make your relationship even more special. It’s the perfect space to have fun, create lasting memories, and stay close—no matter the distance.

Boost your dating confidence with Badoo— the dating app that makes it easy to express your true self.
 
It’s an encouraging, safe space that’s designed to help you make more meaningful connections.
 
How? By keeping it simple, helping you take action with confidence, and giving you the features and support you need to find whatever you’re searching for. Whether that’s dates, a long-term relationship, new friends, or chats.

Plus, with our latest tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, you can say hello to a fun and authentic dating experience. 
 
Download Badoo to take your dating confidence to another level."

Back yourself
On Badoo, it’s all about celebrating you and staying true to your needs. With our various features, it’s easy to put yourself out there with confidence.
Trust your experience
Badoo is a platform that prioritises authenticity. Profile photos can be verified and there are strict user guidelines in place.

How Badoo works
Focusing on who you are and what you want, here are some features making it easier for you to meet your kind of people:  
-Advanced Filters: Finesse your search, and save your time
-Profile Questions: Easily champion your personality
- People Nearby: Meet daters around you
- Encounters: Straight forward swiping, right to connect and left for skip
- Video Chat: Connect with your matches through face to face video calling
- Verified profiles: We have a three-step verification process which, once completed, you can choose to only interact with other verified profiles and find friends
- Blur intimate photos: Using AI, our Private Detector feature detects explicit photos and will let you decide if you want to view or block the image
- Deception Detector: Our new tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, so you can have a fun and authentic dating experience"

Go Premium
Maximise your dating experience. When you upgrade to Badoo Premium, you’ll unlock plenty of features that will make it even easier to find meaningful connections:

- See who's already liked you
- Find exactly what you’re looking for with unlimited Advanced Filters
- Get your messages read first
- Send unlimited likes
 - Control who sees your profile with Invisible Mode
- Undo accidental left swipes  
- And much more...

The price varies by country and may change without notice, but you can always see the exact price in the app. We will charge your card and your subscription will be automatically renewed unless you deactivate the automatic recharge a minimum of 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. Badoo Premium is flexible and adapts to your needs - you can cancel your subscription at any time.
 
For more information, read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://www.badoo.com/privacy
https://badoo.com/terms

Alipay is a leading open platform for payments and digital services in China.

Users with a Chinese ID and bank account can use Alipay to make payments online and in person at various merchants outside of China as they travel for leisure, business, or study. 

Foreign visitors to China can connect their credit card to take advantage of Alipay’s widespread acceptance by tens of millions of merchants across the country. Alipay is not designed or intended for use by foreign users in their home country or anywhere outside of China.

Phone slow? Worried about data security? Clean Most has you covered!

Smart album cleanup, video compression, and quick email/calendar cleanup protect your data privacy—making phone cleanup easier and safer.

-AI Photo Album Manager: Keep Your Album Neat & Organized
Intelligently cleans duplicate/similar photos to keep the best moments; enables one-click cleanup of redundant files to free up mobile storage.

-Video Compressor: Slim Down Large Videos, No More Memory Anxiety
Supports flexible compression rate adjustment; compression won’t affect playback smoothness, freeing up device memory quickly.

-Intelligent Email Cleaner: Never Miss Important Emails
Accurately identifies spam, ads and invalid notifications; one-click batch deletion keeps your inbox neat & organized.

-Efficient Calendar Cleaner: Clearer Time Planning
One-click cleanup of invalid schedules and removal of redundancies for a clearer calendar, supporting efficient time planning.

-Offline Security, Privacy Protection
Data is always stored locally on your device and is never uploaded. We do not collect any data, ensuring your privacy is protected.

-Smart Recycle Bin, Double Protection Against Accidental Deletion
Deleted photos are moved to the Recycle Bin.  A second confirmation is required before permanent deletion, preventing accidental permanent loss.

-Exclusive Photo Memory Customization
Add captions and record exclusive voice notes to photos to document moods and express emotions.

-Why Choose Us?
Intelligent and precise cleanup, say goodbye to cluttered photo albums and storage clutter, improving your cleanup efficiency;
Practical and diverse features, supporting photo cleanup, video compression, email organization, calendar management, and more;
Security and privacy, data is always stored locally on your device, protecting your privacy.

-Clean Most Membership Subscription
Unlock VIP to access all features: album cleanup, video compression, calendar & schedule cleanup, etc.
Weekly Auto-Renewal: 4.99/week；Quarterly Auto-Renewal: 44.99/quarter. Auto-renews on expiration. Exact pricing subject to iAP details.
Cancel anytime, but must turn off auto-renewal at least 24hrs before current period ends—otherwise, your Apple ID will be charged automatically for renewal.
To cancel: Go to Settings → Tap Apple ID → Select Subscriptions → Choose Clean Most → Cancel.

-Legal Terms

description:
Application description:FitPro APP is a smart software that's compatible with smart bracelet devices. This APP can connect to smart bracelet and smart watch via Bluetooth.  It can detect and evaluate the user's sports data, sleep quality, etc. It is very convenient to monitor and adjust your daily life.

Precautions:
1. The sport function will use GPS positioning, so if it's continuous running of the GPS function in the background hat may consume battery power quickly.
2. FitPro has been connected to HealthKit, which can synchronously run data to health

developer: Shenzhen Well fitness Management Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
HiWatchPro是一款基于蓝牙手环开发的app，使用蓝牙4.0通信，里面包统计睡眠、遥控拍照(通过手环拍照)，闹钟设置，久坐提醒（设置提醒时间防止用户坐太久），抬手亮屏、计步、消息推送、勿扰模式、睡眠监测、找手环等功能。用户可以利用app直观的了解身体状况以及运动状况，是一款轻量型助手型工具类app。


注意事项：
1，运动功能会使用GPS定位，在后台持续运行GPS功能可能会大幅消耗电池电量
2，HiWatchPro已接入HealthKit，可同步运行数据到健康
3，HiWatchPro所产生的一切数据，仅用于参考，不能当作健康状况依据。

Create unique invitations and bring people together for life’s most exciting moments. Customise the background of your invitation with a photo from your library, or choose an emoji background to bring your event to life. Easily see who is attending and make sure you never miss a moment by adding a Shared Album directly to the event. Whether you’re attending an event or hosting one yourself, Invites makes it easy to get the party started.

Create beautiful invitations:
* Choose a background from a curated set of options or pick a photo from your own library to catch your guests’ attention.
* Customise the font of your invitation so it feels just right.
* Maps and Weather are automatically added to make sure guests have all the details.

Invite and manage RSVPs:
* Invite others with just a link using any messaging platform.
* Guests can RSVP in the iPhone app or on the web from any device.
* Keep guests up to date on any last minute items by posting a message in the event for all to see.

Fuel the party with Music and relive it with Photos:
* Add a collaborative playlist so guests get to hear their favourite songs at the party.
* Include a Shared Album so everyone can add their favourite photos from the event.
* Access to collaborative playlists and Shared Albums is automatically given to guests in your event.

Requirements:
* Apple Invites is available for all iPhone models with iOS 18 or later.
* Ability to collaborate with Apple Music Playlists requires an Apple Music subscription.
* Anyone can reply to invitations. Creation of invitations requires an iCloud+ subscription.

Use the Amazon Alexa app to manage Alexa-enabled devices, control music playback, view shopping lists on the go, keep track of upcoming reminders, check on active timers and much more. When you enable hands free with Alexa, you can talk to Alexa by simply saying “Alexa” when the app is on your screen. The more you use Alexa, the more she adapts to your voice, vocabulary and personal preferences.

DISCOVER MORE
• Get more out of your Echo device through personalized feature recommendations from Alexa
• Discover and enable recommended Alexa skills

MANAGE YOUR DEVICES

• Create routines to automate your smart home devices

MUSIC & BOOKS
• Connect to music services like Amazon Music, Pandora, Spotify, TuneIn, and iHeartRadio. Choose a song or playlist and listen on your Alexa-enabled devices
• Create speaker groups to play music across your compatible Echo devices for multi-room music

ORGANISE YOUR DAY
• View and edit shopping and to-do lists on the go, get weather and news updates, manage timers and alarms, and more

STAY CONNECTED

Show your true colors with MyScreen—customize everything, from your Lock Screen to icons, charging animation, and widgets, until your personality shines through it all!

My Diary provides a friendly, professional, and personalized diary-journal experience. With its beautiful and thoughtful design, it lets you enjoy every memorable moment.
 
WHAT IS MY DIARY?
 
My Diary is a free online diary with lock. You can use it to record daily journals, secret thoughts, journeys, mood trackers, and any private moments. It is a diary that supports adding photos, themes, diary background, mood, font effects, etc., making your private diary more vivid and safe. Committed to providing the most intimate diary-journal writing experience for users who want to keep a diary and care about their mental health.
 
With the My Diary app, you can:
Write diaries or record journeys anytime, anywhere
Write photo diaries. Add pictures or drawings to make your personal diary more vivid
Customize your journals with themes, moods, font effects, stickers
Use it as a mood-tracker and get mood analysis
Set a password to lock your diary and protect your memories
JOURNALING FOR MENTAL HEALTH
Journaling is a simple way to write down your thoughts and feelings to manage your mental health and control your emotions. Journaling has many benefits, including:
Clear fear and concerns
Manage anxiety and reduce stress
Expressing your emotions. Journaling is really a good mental health tracker and mood tracker
Learn from your experiences and make you happier
Gain control of your emotions etc
 
REASONS FOR CHOOSING THIS JOURNALING APP
 
1. Easy-to-use & Beautiful interface 
* It provides beautiful diary themes. Add enjoyment to every moment of daily journaling
* Night dark theme. Makes it more comfortable when you keep a journal at night
* Well-designed pages, let you start a journal or take notes easily
* Providing journaling guides, Follow it step by step to complete the first diary.
* Powerful rich text effect. It gives you the best experience whether you take journeys notes or write diaries.
 
2. Safe and Private
* My Diary, as a private diary app, protects your memories by setting an app passcode. You can turn on the diary lock to make your diary safe.
* We recommend that you set a security question to avoid forgetting your password and being unable to visit your journal.
 
3. Photo Diary, More Than Words 
* My Diary is a Photo diary. Add photos to make your private journals more memorable.
* Check all journal photos in the Media View Mode
* Add drawings to reflect your ideas and thoughts
 
4. Decorate Your Diary 
* Enjoy the Diary illustrated themes. Whether it’s a travel journal, health journal, girl diary, or mood tracker diary, there will always be a theme you like (Some of them are Premium)
* Choose backgrounds when writing journal entries, see how lovely private journals can be (Some of them are Premium)
* Writing about your feelings helps the brain overcome upsets, clear fears and leaves you happier
 
5. Mood Tracker 
* Some moods cannot be expressed in words, so you can choose mood diary symbols. Add your mood when you start writing diaries or take day notes
* Track mood in the mood calendar
* Check your mood trends in statistics
* Be your free metal health tracker
 
6. Categorize Your Daily Notes with Tags 
* Adding tags for your daily journals
* The suggested categories include Travel notes, work notes, love diary, baby diary, daily motivations, pregnancy diary, etc
* Easily check your entries by tags
 
In summary, It is really a good photo journaling app free for you, a lovely secret diary with lock and a great mood tracker & mental health tracker, which deserves to be installed.
